title: Danydee

content: أهلا وسهلا و مرحبا    (Games and rounds) - win a wonderful Bitbox from Shiftcrypto 🎁

comments.author: Danydee
comments.body: للرجوع إلى قوانين المشاركة.. يستلزم العتور على (شريك/نضير) و من ثم تقديم تسجيل متزامن ! Quote from: Becassine on June 23, 2023, 09:23:35 PM 1. To participate, you must be registered on that forum since at least January 1, 2023. Your mission will be to find a partner in a local section who has written at least 10 messages on the forum. Your partner will also have to register to take part. It's a great opportunity to make new friends. 2. Fill in the survey (about 10mns). No email required. 3. Once you've completed the survey, you'll confirm on the forum that it's done. 4. Prize draw on July 10.
